Class TABLEtag

HTMLTagClass
  |
  +--TABLEtag
public class TABLEtag
extends HTMLTagClass

Table Class, based off of HTML Tag class. This renders an html table tag and its content.

Since:
PHP 4.0.5
Version:
1.0
Author:
Walter A. Boring IV

Method Detail

push_row

public unknown push_row()
push 1 row (tr) of content. Content can be raw strings, or tag objects. Can push 1 item, or multiple items in call. Each item will be its own td. should call push() to push a object, but we detect it here anyway. This function does not save the content by reference. It copies the content and pushes it into the table. If you want to save a reference use push() instead.
Parameters:
mixed - $args The 's to push for next row
Returns:
string

set_default_row_attributes

public unknown set_default_row_attributes(var $attributes)
Sets the default attributes for 's that are added to the table. If there are any attributes set for the it won't use the defaults.
Parameters:
array - $attributes - the default attributes
